post.title: Contentful Fundamental
post.description: While using traditional CMS architecture has been the standard, companies are now looking for increased flexibility and scalability provided by headless CMS solutions. Learn about the difference between [headless CMS](https://contentful.com "Contentful") versus decoupled CMS architecture and why enterprises are embracing content infrastructure.
